context_bundle.summary: SQLite database MCP server with 11 tools: db_open, db_execute, db_query, db_tables, db_schema, db_backup, db_vacuum, db_import_csv, db_export_csv, db_status, db_close. Local persistence for PhiSHRI, session state, agent logs. Binary at X:\mcp-servers\database-mcp-rs\target\release\database-mcp-rs.exe

onboarding.quick_start: 1. db_open (creates phivector.db if no path). 2. db_execute for CREATE/INSERT/UPDATE/DELETE. 3. db_query for SELECT. 4. db_import_csv/db_export_csv for bulk data. 5. db_backup for snapshots. 6. db_close when done.
known_errors: Must call db_open before other operations
WAL mode may leave -wal and -shm files
